description: Denominator of Sum_{k<=n} P(k)/p(k), where p(k) (resp. P(k)) is smallest (resp. largest) prime divisor of k.
references: Handbook of Number Theory, D. S. Mitrinovic et al., Kluwer, Section IV.1(2).
prog: (PARI) a(n) = denominator(sum(k=1, n, f = factor(k)[,1]; if (#f, vecmax(f)/vecmin(f), 1))); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Feb 19 2016
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Sep 13 2000
